name: Mathilde Anglade
introduction: Mathilde is a French-Australian screen and stage actress based in Los Angeles. She is known in Australia for her roles in feature films Streets of Colour, Kick Ons and Life on Earth: Severance, and Chanel 7 comedy TV series Fam Time. She has also played lead roles in dozens of short films, including The Corners of Your Smile for which she received several awards including Outstanding Performance from Best Actor Award. Mathilde also shines on stage. She performed in a sold-out season of Australian queer play The Bed Party at the Old 505 theatre where she received critical acclaim. She is currently in LA performing a play at the Secret Rose Theatre and acting in TV series Pipedream and Subtitles Required.
